text: Watee Po gata Neucok bak badan Dum aneuk Adam masa nyang sudah Aneuk ngon cuco dum keuturonan Jih Neukheun yoh nyan bak dum aruah Kon nyo Lon teuma Po gata bandum Jiseuot yoh nyan beuna that leupah Kamoe ek saksi Droeneuh Po kamoe Nyankeuh bek dudoe ka takheun salah Bek takheun teuma uroe kiamat Tan soe peuingat teuma tapeugah Kamoe nyang lale meunan dum takheun
